title: Stablecoins And The Banking System: Opportunity Or Threat?
description: While most people are enamored with crypto, bitcoin and other digital assets, stablecoins could actually change the game in banking. Is your bank ready?
content:
Stablecoins could flatten the world of finance and allow banks to offer clients a vastly improved ... More money transfer service that is both quicker and cheaper. But risks remain.
